short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Strikethrough, highlight, or hide sponsored results on your search pages.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Sponsor Strikethrough helps you easily spot and manage sponsored content across popular search engines. Whether you want a quick strikethrough, reduced opacity, a subtle red highlight, or to completely hide sponsored results, this extension has you covered.

- Customizable Styling: Strikethrough, opacity adjustment, or red background—choose your preferred way to highlight ads.
- Hide Sponsored: One-click option to completely remove sponsored sections from view.
- Works on Multiple Search Engines: Supports Google, Bing, Yahoo, and DuckDuckGo.
Real-Time Ad Count: See how many sponsored items are on the current page, plus an overall total count in the extension popup.
- Lightweight & Easy to Use: No complicated setup—just install, pick your options, and browse as usual.

With Sponsor Strikethrough, you stay in full control of how search ads appear. Maintain a cleaner, more focused experience or hide them altogether—it's up to you! Send this to your friends or parents that click on too many sponsored links.

Disclaimer: This extension relies on detecting common “Sponsored” or “Ad” labels and known ad container patterns. It may not catch every sponsored link or be perfect for every language or locale. Sponsor Strikethrough is not affiliated with or endorsed by Google, Bing, Yahoo, or DuckDuckGo.
